---
title: Cumulative probit model
---

## Description

The cumulative probit model is a model of ordered discrete data.

## Definition

For discrete ordered outcome $y$ and predictors $x$, the model is:

$$
\begin{align}
y_i \sim \text{cumulative}(\eta_i, c) \\
\eta_i = \alpha + \beta \cdot x_i
\end{align}
$$
